## bubbles.Bubble.setAnchorLocation() method

Set the location the tail of this bubble points to.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setAnchorLocation(anchor: Coordinate, relayout?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  anchor | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) | The location the tail of this bubble points to. |
|  relayout | boolean | _(Optional)_ If true, reposition the bubble from scratch so that it is optimally visible. If false, reposition it so it maintains the same position relative to the anchor. |

**Returns:**

void
